data.text: Renewing our long-haul fleet has been a true team effort with designers, engineers, customer experience executives and iconic Finnish brands. You can now enjoy our new cabins on New York, Singapore, Tokyo, Bangkok, Phuket, Dallas and Doha flights. https://t.co/CAOl5brE6I

urls.title: Inside Finnair’s epic design transformation
urls.description: Finnair’s long haul transformation is set to revolutionise how our customers experience flying between Europe and Asia and the United States. A huge undertaking, the work took on added significance as Finnair looked to create something unique during the challenging months and years of the coronavirus pandemic. The overhaul of the long haul Airbus A330 and A350 fleet has been a true team effort, with designers, engineers, customer experience executives and iconic Finnish brands coming together to work in

data.text: Still unsure about your plans for Christmas break? We are here to help you. Check out these five wonderful cities that offer lots of festive fun – and that you can still find seats for: https://t.co/tnjzVTYUbc

urls.title: Five destinations, five perfect last minute Christmas breaks
urls.description: Still unsure about your plans for Christmas break? We are here to help you. Check out these five wonderful cities that offer lots of festive fun – and that you can still find seats for. Make sure you take your pick and book while there is still availability. Amsterdam goes all out for Christmas season. Your first stop should be at Ice*Amsterdam, a cosy Christmas village on the Museumplein. There is an ice rink, lots of events and entertainment, market stalls, and a bistro selling warming dishes such as

data.text: Do you want to get enchanted in the middle of Lapland's most wonderful landscapes? In Kittilä, you'll find arctic nature, outstanding fells and the freshest air in the world: https://t.co/SzaXGqb5RV https://t.co/v3nTRHiQfH

urls.title: Kittilä – Get enchanted in the middle of Lapland's most wonderful landscapes
urls.description: In Kittilä, you'll find arctic nature, outstanding fells and the freshest air in the world. Head to Pallas-Yllästunturi National Park to experience the magic of Lapland wilderness or spend your holiday with different kinds of activities at the Levi Ski Resort. In Kittilä, you will spend unforgettable moments whether you wish to get away from the city bustle and relax in the wilderness or have an active holiday in the vicinity of the most beautiful nature spots. Less than 15 kilometres north of Kittilä

data.text: You can now reach many dream destinations around the globe easier than before via Doha. Read our tips on the best places to go: https://t.co/tRFkmOaCBs https://t.co/ULRc9ZcFNi

urls.title: Our route to Doha opens up a world of new destinations
urls.description: Finnair flies to the capital of Qatar, Doha from November onwards. The city is a great connection point, and you can now reach many dream destinations around the globe easier than before. Read our tips on the best places to go via Doha. Doha is a natural stopping point when heading towards the southern parts of Africa. Cape Town in South Africa is one of the destinations you could choose to explore. The city is on a southwestern peninsula, right beneath the incredible Table Mountain. Cape Town is a great

data.text: @Claudiacd01 Hi Claudia, according to international legislation, a claim for delayed baggage must be made within 21 days. urls.title: Effects of transport worker union’s strike on Finnair flights
urls.description: The Transport Worker’s Union in Finland has issued a strike warning regarding Finnair’s cabin crew between 3 p.m. 20 November and 3 p.m. 21 November 2022 at Helsinki Airport. The strike will have considerable impacts on Finnair operations and unfortunately, we are forced to cancel several flights. W e apologize for the worry and inconvenience this may cause you. If your flight is cancelled, we do our best to re-route you to your destination or you can apply for a refund for unused tickets. If you have a

data.text: @deano_42 Hi Dean, we are handling the cancellations flight per flight and you should receive details by tonight if your flight is affected. We do our best to provide you with alternative routing as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @the_irvman Hi Irving, I apologise for the inconvenience! Are you able to log in to Manage booking: https://t.co/GlMBvsVJnA and see an alternative routing there if your flight is cancelled? Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @nordicteija @IiiKarhu @heta77 @FinnairSuomi Hei Teija, olen todella pahoillani aiheutuneesta harmista! Käsittelemme peruutukset lento kerrallaan ja viestimme sinulle suoraan lentoosi tulevista muutoksista. Teemme parhaamme tarjotaksemme vaihtoehtoisen reitityksen mahdollisimman nopeasti. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Effects of transport worker union’s strike warning on Finnair flights
urls.description: The Transport Worker’s Union in Finland has issued a strike warning regarding Finnair’s cabin crew between 3 p.m. 20 November and 3 p.m. 21 November 2022 at Helsinki Airport. The strike will have considerable impacts on Finnair operations and unfortunately, we are forced to cancel several flights. We apologize for the worry and inconvenience this may cause you. If your flight is cancelled, we do our best to re-route you to your destination or you can apply for a refund for unused tickets. If you have a

data.text: @76StqWwx0wosEYR Hi, all cancellations should be done and communicated by this evening. We handle the cancellations flight per flight and send you information if your flight is affected. If your flight is not affected, there is no separate message about that. (1/2)
